register.description: This register contains the IP revision code.

bitfield.description: IP Revision, value 0 to FFFF FFFFh.

register.description: This register allows controlling various parameters of the OCP interface.

bitfield.description: OCP Clock activity when module is in IDLE mode (during wake up mode period).
Slave interface power management (IDLE req/ack control).
Module software reset. This bit is automatically reset by hardware (During reads, it always returns 0.). It has same effect as the OCP hardware reset.
Internal OCP clock gating strategy. (No module visible impact other than saving power.)
Internal reset monitoring (OCP domain). Undefined since: From hardware perspective, the reset state is 0. From software user perspective, when the accessible module is 1.

register.description: This register doubles as a status register for the error-location processes.

bitfield.description: Error-location status for a full page, based on the mask definition.
Error-location interrupt mask bit for syndrome polynomial 7.
Error-location interrupt mask bit for syndrome polynomial 6.
Error-location interrupt mask bit for syndrome polynomial 5.
Error-location interrupt mask bit for syndrome polynomial 4.
Error-location interrupt mask bit for syndrome polynomial 3.
Error-location interrupt mask bit for syndrome polynomial 2.
Error-location interrupt mask bit for syndrome polynomial 1.
Error-location interrupt mask bit for syndrome polynomial 0.
Maximum size of the buffers for which the error-location engine is used, in number of nibbles (4 bits entities), value 0 to 7FFh.
Set to 1 if syndrome polynomial 7 is part of the page in page mode. Must be 0 in continuous mode.
Set to 1 if syndrome polynomial 6 is part of the page in page mode. Must be 0 in continuous mode.
Set to 1 if syndrome polynomial 5 is part of the page in page mode. Must be 0 in continuous mode.
Set to 1 if syndrome polynomial 4 is part of the page in page mode. Must be 0 in continuous mode.
Set to 1 if syndrome polynomial 3 is part of the page in page mode. Must be 0 in continuous mode.
Set to 1 if syndrome polynomial 2 is part of the page in page mode. Must be 0 in continuous mode.
Set to 1 if syndrome polynomial 1 is part of the page in page mode. Must be 0 in continuous mode.
Set to 1 if syndrome polynomial 0 is part of the page in page mode. Must be 0 in continuous mode.
Syndrome bits 0 to 31, value 0 to FFFF FFFFh.

Syndrome bits 64 to 95, value 0 to FFFF FFFFh.
Syndrome bits 96 to 127, value 0 to FFFF FFFFh.

Syndrome bits 192 to 207, value 0 to FFFFh.
